alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 05 at 10:55AM CDT until April 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Towner, Cavalier and Western Walsh Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
